titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain land held in trust for the Paiute Indian Tribe of Utah to the City of Richfield, Utah, and for other purposes.
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain land held in trust for the Paiute Indian Tribe of Utah to the City of Richfield, Utah, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary:
Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified land held by the United States in trust for the Paiute Indian tribe of Utah to the city of Richfield, Utah, subject to specified conditions.
Makes part of the tribe's reservation any land acquired in trust for the tribe after February 17, 1984, and before enactment of this Act.
